Function reference

Create survival curves

Build Plot

ggsurvfit()
Plot Survival Probability
ggcuminc()
Plot Cumulative Incidence

Add Confidence Interval

Add risk table

Add Censor Marking

Add Quantile Annotation

Add p-value
